pnp_state Struct Reference

#include <search.h>

Detailed Description

captures all pick and place data columns.

which were read successfully in from a pick and place file.
There is only one pnp file at any time valid, for the whole project. Loading a second pnp file results in complete loss of previous pick_and_place data.

typedef struct pnp_state {

char designator[MAXL];
char footprint[MAXL];
double mid_x;
double mid_y;
double ref_x;
double ref_y;
double pad_x;
double pad_y;
char layer[MAXL]; T is top B is bottom
double rotation;
char comment[MAXL];
int shape;
double width;
double length;

unsigned int nuf_push; Nuf pushes to estimate stack size
struct pnp_state *next;
} pnp_state_t;
